name: IRT
descr: IRT (Implicit Testing) Timed question with Positve vs Negative answers

props.name: Decreasing Timer
props.descr: True if timer should decrease from a default value of 5 (Timeout can be changed)

props.name: Display cooldown countdown
props.descr: Displaing the seconds before the next statement is available for rating (Show by default)

props.name: Display Question Text
props.descr: Show or hide the question text (hidden by default)

props.name: Display Statement in Advance
props.descr: Display each statement, before the answers for specific time for longer statements (default is 5 seconds)

props.name: Custom Timeout Value
props.descr: Allows to customise the value on timeout

props.name: Timeout
props.descr: Time in seconds before timeout alert for a statement (default is 5 seconds)

props.name: Show statement in advance - seconds
props.descr: Define for how long the statement should be visible, before the respondent can rate it (Display Statement in Advance needs to be set to true)

props.name: Default timeout value
props.descr: What value should be used on timing out (default is -1)

props.name: Dialog title message
props.descr: Sets the text fot the alert title that pops up

props.name: Dialog body message
props.descr: Sets the text fot the alert that pops up
props.value: You need to be faster for the next one!
